content:
The Milky Way Cygnus Area of the Milky Way Photos are taken in Voskopojë, Albania.
Taken on the Pixel 7 using Google Camera in Astrophotography mode.
4 minutes of exposure, post-edited in Snapseed with different settings.
Image Gallery of Other Photos of the Cygnus Area Using different positions, zoom scales and edits.
title: The Milky Way Galaxy 2023

content:
Polaris Star Trails in Voskopoje Photo taken in Voskopojë, Albania.
Taken on the Pixel 7
1 hour total of photos Google Camera camera app with the night mode setting 6s exposure, 8s between each picture using the Intervalometer app Stitched together using StarStaX Post-edited in Lightroom with different settings.
Timelapse Your browser doesn't support HTML5 video. Here is a link to the video instead. Polaris Star Trails in Munich Photo taken in Munich.
Taken on the Pixel 7
1 hour total of photos Google Camera camera app with the night mode setting 6s exposure, 8s between each picture using the Intervalometer app Stitched together using StarStaX Post-edited in Lightroom with different settings.
Timelapse Your browser doesn't support HTML5 video. Here is a link to the video instead. Stitching in ffmpeg Photos from StarStaX combined together using ffmpeg
1 ffmpeg -framerate 29 -pattern_type glob -i 'Star*.jpg' -vf scale=iw/2:ih/2,format=yuv420p -crf 18 -c:v libx264 outx264.mp4 Star Trails From Video These are some of my first tries using images extracted from the short videos that the Astrophotography feature produces.
… and other methods
title: Star Trails 2023

content:
Landscape view of the Milky Way Photo taken in Voskopojë, Albania.
Taken on the Pixel 6 using Google Camera in Astrophotography mode.
4 minutes of exposure, post-edited in Snapseed with different settings.
Timelapse Your browser doesn't support HTML5 video. Here is a link to the video instead. Video created by merging 4 videos, 1 second each from the Astrophotography feature of the Pixel 6.

title: The Milky Way Galaxy 2022
